description: Returns the state of the given custom app.

parameters.name: Domain
parameters.description: The name of the domain of the app.

parameters.name: Simulation
parameters.description: The name of the simulation of the app.

nested_items.name: Domain
nested_items.description: The name of the domain of the app.

nested_items.name: EndpointInfo
nested_items.description: Information about the network endpoint for the custom app. You can use the endpoint to connect to the custom app.

nested_items.name: Address
nested_items.description: The IP address of the app. SimSpace Weaver dynamically assigns this IP address when the app starts.

nested_items.name: IngressPortMappings
nested_items.description: The inbound TCP/UDP port numbers of the app. The combination of an IP address and a port number form a network endpoint.

nested_items.name: Actual
nested_items.description: The TCP/UDP port number of the running app. SimSpace Weaver dynamically assigns this port number when the app starts. SimSpace Weaver maps the Declared port to the Actual port. Clients connect to the app using the app's IP address and the Actual port number.

nested_items.name: Declared
nested_items.description: The TCP/UDP port number of the app, declared in the simulation schema. SimSpace Weaver maps the Declared port to the Actual port. The source code for the app should bind to the Declared port.

nested_items.name: LaunchOverrides
nested_items.description: Options that apply when the app starts. These options override default behavior.

nested_items.name: LaunchCommands
nested_items.description: App launch commands and command line parameters that override the launch command configured in the simulation schema.

nested_items.name: Simulation
nested_items.description: The name of the simulation of the app.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The current lifecycle state of the custom app.

nested_items.name: TargetStatus
nested_items.description: The desired lifecycle state of the custom app.
